title: Account logged in from another location
body:
Just finished a game and got the message saying my account was logged in from another location, although I wasn't logged in at all. (even from a friends standpoint who was in discord at the time) I know it's really unlikely but is there ANY possibility that this is from a bug.
(already changed passwords)

replies.body: That was most likely caused by someone else logging into your account from elsewhere. I'd highly suggest reaching out to us through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) in order to make sure you still have full control of your account!
